fko.chessly.util

Class LruCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap<K,V>
        • java.util.LinkedHashMap
          • fko.chessly.util.LruCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map

    public class LruCache
extends java.util.LinkedHashMap

    This class is an implementation of a LRUCache extending LinkedHashMap. Compared to a "normal" HashMap this class sets a maximum number of entries by deleting the least recent used object.

    This class is not thread safe (synchronized)
    Author:
    Frank Kopp (frank@familie-kopp.de)
    See Also:
    LinkedHashMap, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • LruCache

        public LruCache(int initialCapacity,
                float loadFactor,
                boolean accessOrder,
                int maxEntries)
        Constructs an empty LruCache instance with the specified initial capacity, load factor and ordering mode.
        This class also has a method to set the minimum free memory left for the VM. If less memory than this minimum is available the LruCache will purge old entries every time a new entry is added.
        Parameters:
        initialCapacity - - the initial capacity
        loadFactor - - the load factor
        accessOrder - - the ordering mode - true for access-order, false for insertion-order
        maxEntries - - the maximal number of entries this LruCache will hold
        See Also:
        LinkedHashMap

    • Method Detail

      • setMinFreeMemLeft

        public void setMinFreeMemLeft(int percent)
        Sets the minimum available memory in percent of the virtual machines
        Parameters:
        percent - amount of minimum memory left (not used by cache)

      • setMaxEntries

        public void setMaxEntries(int maxEntries)
        Sets the maximal number of objects this LruCache will hold.
        Parameters:
        maxEntries - Maximal number of cache entries

      • getMaxEntries

        public int getMaxEntries()
        Gets the maximal number this LruCache will hold.
        Returns:
        MAX_ENTRIES

      • removeEldestEntry

        protected boolean removeEldestEntry(java.util.Map.Entry eldest)
        Implements removeEldestEntry from LinkedHashMap to determine if the eldest entry shall be removed (LRU)
        Overrides:
        removeEldestEntry in class java.util.LinkedHashMap
        Parameters:
        eldest - Removes the eldest entry. Will be called everytime an entry is added
        Returns:
        true or false
